actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax retirement annuities and pensions paid by the United States to its employees.

summary.text: Allows an income tax exclusion under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 for retirement annuities and pensions paid by the United States to its employees. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 5)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax retirement annuities and pensions paid by the United States to its employees.
